Class BattleshipController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game.Controller.BattleshipController

extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for the game Battleship

      • handleGridClick

        public void handleGridClick​(boolean isPlayersBoard,
                            int x,
                            int y)
        Responds clicked square event and responds based on what state the game is in
        Parameters:
        isPlayersBoard - True if square being clicked belongs to player, false otherwise
        x - X coordinate of clicked square
        y - Y coordinate of clicked square

      • placeShip

        public void placeShip​(int x,
                      int y)
        Attempts to place a ship on the player's board at coordinates (x,y)
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate that the player would like to place their ship at
        y - Y coordinate that the player would like to place their ship at

      • validateGuess

        public void validateGuess​(boolean isPlayersBoard,
                          int x,
                          int y)
        Validates a guess on the player's or system's game board
        Parameters:
        isPlayersBoard - True if square being guessed belongs to player, false otherwise
        x - X coordinate of the square being guessed
        y - Y coordinate of the square being guessed
